video.title: Attack on Titan
video.synopsis: With his hometown in ruins, young Eren Yeager becomes determined to fight back against the giant Titans that threaten to destroy the human race.

episodes.synopsis: After 100 years of peace, humanity is suddenly reminded of the terror of being at the Titans' mercy.
episodes.title: To You, After 2,000 Years: The Fall of Shiganshina, Part 1

episodes.synopsis: After the Titans break through the wall, the citizens of Shiganshina must run for their lives. Those who make it to safety find a harsh life awaiting.
episodes.title: That Day: The Fall of Shiganshina, Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Eren begins his training with the Cadet Corps. When he struggles with a maneuvering exercise, Berholt and Reiner offer kindly advice.
episodes.title: A Dim Light in the Darkness of Despair: Humanity Rises Again, Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Annie proves her skill in a sparring session, Jan dreams of serving alongside the King, and graduation day brings shocking revelations and violence.
episodes.title: Night of the Graduation Ceremony: Humanity Rises Again, Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Eren faces off against the Colossal Titan after it appears out of nowhere and knocks a strategic hole in the Rose Wall gate.
episodes.title: First Battle: Battle of Trost District, Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Armin copes with the loss of his friends and allies after Titans massacre his squad. Elsewhere in the city, Mikasa takes out several of the monsters.
episodes.title: The World She Saw: Battle of Trost District, Part 2

episodes.synopsis: After the retreat bell sounds, many cadets lack enough fuel to scale the wall back to safety. A new type of Titan stokes Mikasa's will to fight.
episodes.title: The Small Blade: Battle of Trost District, Part 3

episodes.synopsis: Armin comes up with a risky plan that pits Titan against Titan as the abandoned Cadets attempt to take back their headquarters.
episodes.title: Hearing the Heartbeat: Battle of Trost District, Part 4

episodes.synopsis: Cannons are fixed on Eren as he struggles to remember what happened to him inside the belly of a monster and how he ended up humankind's enemy.
episodes.title: Where the Left Arm Went: Battle of Trost District, Part 5

episodes.synopsis: Cadets respond to Eren's terrifying transformation with doubt and fear. Armin must convince the commander to use Eren's powers for the good of humans.
episodes.title: Answer: Battle of Trost District, Part 6

episodes.synopsis: Plans are made to use Eren's powers to seal the hole in the wall so as to reclaim Trost. But the biggest threat to humankind may not be the Titans.
episodes.title: Icon: Battle of Trost District, Part 7

episodes.synopsis: The plan to reclaim Trost falls apart when Eren's newfound powers turn him into a mindless giant. Meanwhile, Titans continue to swarm the city.
episodes.title: Wound: Battle of Trost District, Part 8

episodes.synopsis: Jean takes desperate measures to replace his broken maneuvering device. Eren is able to plug the hole in the wall with help from his fellow cadets.
episodes.title: Primal Desires: Battle of Trost District, Part 9

episodes.synopsis: In a special military tribunal, the Military Police calls for Eren's execution, but the Scout Regiment argues he's a powerful resource for humankind.
episodes.title: Still Can't See: Prelude to the Counterattack, Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Eren is moved to an abandoned castle to continue his training. Hanzi has been putting two captured Titans through a series of tests and trials.
episodes.title: Special Operations Squad: Prelude to the Counterattack, Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Everyone's a suspect in the investigation to find out who killed the test-subject Titans. Meanwhile, the Cadets struggle to pick which corps to join.
episodes.title: What Should be Done: Prelude to the Counterattack, Part 3

episodes.synopsis: As the Scout Regiment begins its push toward Shiganshina, they encounter an intelligent Female Titan unlike any they've seen before.
episodes.title: Female Titan: 57th Expedition Beyond the Walls, Part 1

episodes.synopsis: The Female Titan keeps tearing its way through the Scout Regiment. Levi splits the ranks and sends Eren and the supply wagons through a huge forest.
episodes.title: Forest of Giant Trees: 57th Expedition Beyond the Walls, Part 2

episodes.synopsis: As the Female Titan continues to slaughter members of the Scout Regiment, Eren faces a difficult decision: trust his teammates or act out on his own.
episodes.title: Bite: 57th Expedition Beyond the Walls, Part 3

episodes.synopsis: The Female Titan's been captured, and it's Erwin's goal to find out who the human is lurking inside it. The Scouts realize there's a spy among them.
episodes.title: Erwin Smith: 57th Expedition Beyond the Walls, Part 4

episodes.synopsis: A traitor's infiltrated the Scouts, destroying their ranks from within. When she takes the form of the Female Titan, Eren prepares for a brutal fight.
episodes.title: Crushing Blow: 57th Expedition Beyond the Walls, Part 5

episodes.synopsis: After watching Eren get swallowed by the Female Titan, Mikasa and Levi follow the brutal monster in the hopes that he's still alive inside her.
episodes.title: The Defeated: 57th Expedition Beyond the Walls, Part 6

episodes.synopsis: After the failed scouting expedition, Eren and his superiors are summoned to the capital. Annie agrees to join Armin in a plot to defy the government.
episodes.title: Smile: Raid on Stohess District, Part 1

episodes.synopsis: When the identity of the Female Titan is finally revealed, she goes on a rampage within Wall Sina. Armin and Mikasa try to stop the towering monster.
episodes.title: Mercy: Raid on Stohess District, Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Eren goes head to head with the Female Titan in a fight, demolishing the Stohess District inside Wall Sina. Erwin faces the consequences of his plan.
episodes.title: Wall: Raid on Stohess District, Part 3
